feed.title: SAP Community - SAP Fiori
feed.subtitle: SAP Fiori Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: Fragment not showing data in SAPUI5 app in SAP BAS (Component-preload.js & model issue)
entry.content:
Hello Experts,

I am creating a simple “Hello SAPUI5” app in SAP Business Application Studio (BAS) to practice MVC, data binding, fragments, and routing.

I am facing two issues:
1. When I click “Open Dialog”, the fragment opens but no data is displayed.
2. In the console, I see:
• Component-preload.js not found
• Manifest: dataSource "localModel" not found or invalid

Folder Structure:
webapp/
├── index.html
├── Component.js
├── manifest.json
├── model/
│    └── data.json
├── view/
│    └── View1.view.xml
├── controller/
│    └── View1.controller.js
└── fragment/
     └── Dialog.fragment.xml


manifest.json (relevant part)

{
  "_version": "1.12.0",
  "sap.app": {
    "id": "myApp",
    "type": "application",
    "applicationVersion": {
      "version": "1.0.0"
    },
    "title": "Hello SAPUI5"
  },
  "sap.ui": {
    "technology": "UI5",
    "deviceTypes": {
      "desktop": true,
      "tablet": true,
      "phone": true
    }
  },
  "sap.ui5": {
    "dependencies": {
      "minUI5Version": "1.84.0",
      "libs": {
        "sap.m": {}
      }
    },
    "rootView": {
      "viewName": "myApp.view.App",
      "type": "XML",
      "async": true,
      "id": "app"
    },
    "dataSources": {
      "localModel": {
        "uri": "model/data.json",
        "type": "JSON"
      }
    },
    "models": {
      "": {
        "dataSource": "localModel",
        "type": "sap.ui.model.json.JSONModel",
         "settings": {
          "preload": true
        }
      }
    },
   
    "routing": {
      "config": {
        "routerClass": "sap.m.routing.Router",
        "viewType": "XML",
        "viewPath": "myApp.view",
        "controlId": "app",
        "controlAggregation": "pages",
        "async": true
      },
      "routes": [
        {
          "pattern": "",
          "name": "View1",
          "target": "View1"
        },
        {
          "pattern": "View2",
          "name": "View2",
          "target": "View2"
        }
      ],
      "targets": {
        "View1": {
          "viewName": "View1"
        },
        "View2": {
          "viewName": "View2"
        }
      }
    }
  }
}




model/data.json

{
 "employee": {
   "name": "Ashwin",
   "role": "SAPUI5 Developer"
 },
 "team": [
   { "name": "Ravi", "role": "Backend Developer" },
   { "name": "Meera", "role": "UI Designer" },
   { "name": "John", "role": "Tester" }
 ]
}


fragment/Dialog.fragment.xml

<core:FragmentDefinition xmlns="sap.m" xmlns:core="sap.ui.core">
<Dialog title="Employee Info">
<content>
<Text text="{name}" />
<Text text="{role}" />
</content>
<buttons>
<Button text="Close" press=".onCloseDialog" />
</buttons>
</Dialog>
</core:FragmentDefinition>


 View1.controller.js (fragment loading)

sap.ui.define([
 "sap/ui/core/mvc/Controller",
 "sap/m/MessageToast",
 "sap/ui/core/syncStyleClass"
], function (Controller, MessageToast, syncStyleClass) {
 "use strict";
 return Controller.extend("myApp.controller.View1", {
   onNavToView2: function () {
     this.getOwnerComponent().getRouter().navTo("View2");
   },
   onOpenDialog: function () {
     var that = this;
     if (!this._pDialog) {
       this._pDialog = this.loadFragment({ name: "myApp.fragment.Dialog" }).then(function (oDialog) {
         that.getView().addDependent(oDialog);
         // Forward content density
         var sDensity = that.getOwnerComponent().getContentDensityClass
           ? that.getOwnerComponent().getContentDensityClass()
           : "";
         if (sDensity) syncStyleClass(sDensity, that.getView(), oDialog);
         //  bind employee context to fragment
         oDialog.setModel(that.getView().getModel());
         oDialog.bindElement("/employee");
         return oDialog;
       });
     }
     this._pDialog.then(function (oDialog) { oDialog.open(); });
   },
   onCloseDialog: function () {
     if (this._pDialog) this._pDialog.then(function (oDialog) { oDialog.close(); });
   }
 });
});

 

Here is the UI Fragment:

 


Console Errors
• Component-preload.js not found
• Manifest: dataSource "localModel" not found or invalid
• Fragment opens, but data is not shown

Expected:
When I click “Open Dialog”, it should show:
Employee: Ashwin
Role: SAPUI5 Developer

Question:
• Am I binding the fragment incorrectly?
• Do I need to load the JSON model differently in BAS?
• How to fix the Component-preload.js not found error?

Thanks in advance for your guidance!

entry.title: RAP Fiori Elements List Report Object Page HTML Control Cache Problem
entry.content:
Hi;

We have a RAP application consist of a list report and an object page with details and items sections. We extend the object page in BAS and added a custom section to the top of the object page. Later we added a sap.ui.core.HTML control to show a specific HTML content. Everything works fine. But when we click the navigation button on every line in the list report it adds the clicked HTML content on top of old HTML content. The HTML control does not clear the old content. I think it has a cache problem. We do some research and made some minor developments in BAS but no change. How can we clear the HTML control content right after we click the navigation button? Can you help us on this issue.?

entry.title: How to add account assignment columns to PR item table in My Inbox (Public Cloud)?
entry.content:
Hello experts,

I’m working in SAP S/4HANA Cloud, Public Edition and have a question regarding the "My Inbox" app for the overall release of Purchase Requisitions (PR).

Currently, when I open a PR approval task in My Inbox, the item details are shown in a table inside the task UI. This table displays standard columns like material, quantity, price, etc.

My requirement:
I need to add additional columns to this table for account assignment data—specifically:

  • GL account
  • Cost center
  • WBS element

The goal is to show these fields directly in the item table, so approvers don’t have to drill down into each item’s detail screen.

Questions:

  1. Is there any supported way in Public Cloud to enhance the columns of the item table in the My Inbox task UI?
  2. Can this be achieved via Custom Fields and Logic, or any BAdI/CDS extension?
  3. If not possible, what are the recommended alternatives?

Any guidance, documentation, or best practices would be greatly appreciated.

Kind Regards,
Simon

entry.title: S/4 HANA Public Cloud_How to configure the process template when performing a BP mass update
entry.content: In the "Manage Mass Maintenance - BP" app on SAP Fiori, after creating a new project, I couldn't select any process template under the "Process Template" section. As a result, the "Start" button is not clickable. So, where is the process template configured, and how is it set up in SAP Fiori?

entry.title: I cannot log in to see the internal Fiori Guideline site
entry.content: I could log in before without any issues, but a couple of months after the new guideline version launch, I noticed that I was using the external version. I could figure out that I have to log in, which was working perfectly fine till a couple of weeks before. The site does not log me in; it lands me on an odd profile site where I cannot go back to the internal site. Can you provide me a solution?

entry.title: Sap Fiori KPI Trend Tile not working properly
entry.content:
Hello!

I have been studying the Fiori Smart Business KPIs for a while and i think i have a pretty good understanding on how they work. I know how to create them and all the details that can be adjusted. But i cannot get the Trend Tile to work properly. 
The issue that i am having is that the Tile ALWAYS only shows only three datapoints in the graph like this:

I have tried with Annotations, i have tried different dimension datatypes like Date, Timestamp ore DateTimeOffset, i have tried adding Filters but nothing made any difference. I even asked different AIs, although i wasn't expecting anything meaningful from them.

I was about to give up and just accept the fact that maybe they can only show three points until i tried implementing a Mini Tile in my Drilldown Report and suddenly the tile has more than three datapoints:

So this means that it obviously is possible to get more datapoints, i just must be doing something wrong but i don't know what. Can anyone explain to me why this is happening or what the reasons for this could be? All i want is for my normal Tile to look like the Mini Tile in the Drilldown Report...

Thanks already, i hope someone can help me with this.

entry.title: Navigate to Find Maintenance Order Confirmation (F2174) app from Find Maintenance Order (F2175)
entry.content:
Hello Everyone - Find Maintenance Order (F2175) and Find Maintenance Order Confirmation (F2174) both are related apps as we would have confirmations against an order. However, we do not see an option to navigate to F2174 (using More Links) from F2175. In Fiori Apps Reference Library of F2175, we can see F2174 under Related Apps --> Other Apps in EAM - Order but not mapped as Navigation Target. 

Can you help with how we can enable an option to navigate to F2174 app from F2175 app?

Thanks,

PS

entry.title: Adaptation editor for SAPUI5 adaptation project with VS Code - On Prem
entry.content:
Hello everyone,

I’ve created a UI5 adaptation project using the new Adaptation Editor generator (from the latest UI5 tooling update).

The project generation and build completed successfully without any errors.

However, when I try to preview or open the Adaptation Editor from my variant, the browser launches but:

  • The application does not render (blank page).

  • No UI5 controls or components are loaded.

  • The console doesn’t show any clear errors related to UI5 modules, but the app never initializes.

Here’s what I’ve done and verified so far:

  1. Generated the adaptation project via the new generator (https://www.npmjs.com/package/@sap-ux/generator-adp)

  2. file .variant structure are correctly created.

  3. Verified that the base application loads normally outside of the adaptation project.

  4. Tried different browsers and cleared the cache — same result.

Question:

  1. Has anyone experienced this behavior with the new Adaptation Editor generator ?
  2. Is there any known configuration or dependency missing to make the preview work properly ?

Any insights or troubleshooting steps would be greatly appreciated.

entry.title: Unable to extend standard Fiori app
entry.content:
Hello everyone,

I’m working on the standard SAP Fiori app F1643A – on SAP S/4HANA 2023 (on-premise S03).
Documentation: https://fioriappslibrary.hana.ondemand.com/sap/fix/externalViewer/#/detail/Apps('F1643A')/S30OP 

The requirement is to display some custom fields that were generated and are already available in the classic ME51N transaction.

However, in the app documentation link above, I couldn’t find the “Extension” tab, does that mean that the app cannot be extended ? or is there another way to enable those fields in this app?

Thank you in advance for your help!

entry.title: Extend the Manage Purchase Order FIORI app (F0842A) with an existing field from EKPO
entry.content:
Hello All,

I am still new to FIORI app extensions, so your feedback is much appreciated. I have the following requirement.

I need to extend the Manage Purchase Order App (F0842A) with an existing field from EKPO. The extension needs to occur at the Item level of the Purchase order since the field is from EKPO. And the field should also be available when one tries to create a purchase order via the app.

I tried to achieve this using CDS view extension but it is failing. I have extended the following CDS views:

E_PurchasingDocumentItem----->I_PurchaseOrderItemTP------->C_PurchaseOrderItemTP.

I am able to see the data in SQL viewer but while trying open the FIORI app, it throws a dump stating the following:

From the error, I understand that the field I am using in the CDS views needs to be incorporated in the table PURORDITMTP_D. And here the extension is done by adding the field in EKPO_INCL_EEW_PS. But this is creating an entirely new custom field and defeats the purpose of using the existing field from EKPO.

Could anyone please guide me through this? Is this even possible with CDS extension ? Or do I need to look for FIORI APP extensibility project to achieve this requirement?

 

Thanks in advance.

entry.title: Valuation Price in Purchase Requisition App
entry.content:
Hello experts,

I’m facing a difference in behavior between ME51N and the new Create Purchase Requisition fiori app

When I create a Purchase Requisition in ME51N, the valuation price (EBAN-PREIS) field is editable, however when I use the Fiori app (after selecting a material from the catalog or cart) the valuation price field is not editable for the same material

How can I make the valuation price field editable in the Fiori app as it is in ME51N?

Thank you in advance

entry.title: Upload Customer Open Items (F4051). Error KI235 Account requires relevant to cost accounting
entry.content:
Hi everyone:

I'm writing this issue that I been having from a while in fiori app Upload Customer Open Items (F4051), in a system where CO-PA is active.

Full message is: 

Account & requires an account assignment relevant to cost accounting

Message No. KI235

Diagnosis

You have not defined a CO account assignment for an account that is relevant to cost accounting.

System Response

Account & is defined as a cost element.
This means that you must always specify a CO account assignment.

Procedure

Enter one of the following CO account assignments:

  • Order
  • Cost center / cost center/ activity type
  • Sales order item (for a project or cost relevant)
  • Project / WBS element
  • Cost object (Process manufacturing)
  • Network/ Network activity
  • Business Process
  • Profitability segment
  • Real estate object

The posting row affected is 000, account &.

entry.title: Source of Supply Not Automatically Determined in Fiori App
entry.content:
Hello,

I am experiencing an issue with the Fiori app "My Purchase Requisitions – New" (App ID: F1639A) 

When creating a purchase requisition using this app, the system does not automatically determine the source of supply in the Source of Supply tab.

However, for the same material, plant, and purchasing organization, the source of supply is automatically determined when using the ME51N transaction in the SAP GUI without issue

I reviewed SAP Note 3539290, which seems relevant, but unfortunately, it cannot be implemented in our current system version.

Do you have any suggestions? Thank you in advance

entry.title: Fiori KPI Tiles in App F2035 (Material Scrap) Show “No Data” – Why?
entry.content:
I’m facing an issue in SAP Fiori App F2035 (Production Scrap Analysis). On the Launchpad, the KPI tiles show “No Data”, even though the underlying app can display data when I adjust filters manually.

The affected tiles are:

  • Operation Scrap by Work Center
  • Material Scrap Maximum Deviation
  • Scrap Reason by Work Center

When I open the detailed view, I see the message:

“No data found. Try adjusting search or filter parameters.”

After changing the date range, the data appears correctly. However, when I return to the Launchpad, the tiles remain empty.

The date range in the detailed view is set to 01.01.2023 – 31.12.2024, which seems outdated. I suspect this is related to the default filter configuration for these KPI tiles.

How can i change the set date range?

entry.title: SAP Fiori Tools - Errors while creating Fiori Apps
entry.content:
Hi, been working with extensions with Application Wizard, and SAP Fiori Tools for almost two years, since yesterday and last updates from these extensions and libraries, for I can tell it's the first time I have these kind of problems in creating apps, but not currently having problems in running, testing, or uploading apps. As you can see I've been trying to remove, installing libraries, cache, or even extension files from VSCode. I cannot assume it can be an update thing, a coworker show me with a full installation of extensions (after months he uninstalling them), he can create Fiori apps without any trouble. The errors or warnings I'd had before was:

@SAP/fiori:app generator failed - env.on(error) You don't seem to have a generator with the name “@sap/fiori:fiori-freestyle” installed.

Does someone knows how can I manage these situation?

Have a nice day, greetings!

entry.title: set CFL fields to display only in standard fiori app F4839 Manage Manual Reservations
entry.content:
Hi All,

we have few custom fields added in F4839 Manage Manual Reservations. Is there a way we can set these field to display only when user is editing other standard field ?

Thank you in advance for your help.

entry.title: How to Download Adaptation Project Deployed to S/4HANA On-Premise System
entry.content:
For UI5 Apps and legacy UI5 Extension Projects, the project source is deployed to the UI5 ABAP Repository as a BSP Application, and program /UI5/UI5_REPOSITORY_LOAD can be used to download the source files in a ZIP file (at least those that were included in the deployment).

Adaptation Projects are deployed to the Layered Repository, not the UI5 ABAP Repository, and so the same program cannot be used. Is there an alternative program which can download the adaptation project source from the Layered Repository in a similar way? Is there a way to extract an adaptation project from an S/4HANA On-Premise system using Fiori Tools in BAS or VS Code?

entry.title: How to get all input fields from a fragment without using their IDs
entry.content:
Dear experts,

I know that getValue()works with specific control IDs, but I would like to retrieve all the input fields from a fragment without accessing each one by its ID.

Is there a recommended way to achieve this in SAPUI5?

Kind regards,
Lein

entry.title: SmartTable not displaying value text (Text Association) in SAPUI5 app embedded in MyInbox
entry.content:
Hi everyone,

 

I’m fairly new to SAPUI5 development, so please excuse me if my explanation isn’t perfectly professional yet 🙂

I’m currently working on a freestyle SAPUI5 app that is embedded into MyInbox. In MyInbox, users can handle various tasks — including invoice processing tasks.

My app is displayed for those invoice tasks and shows detailed invoice data.

 

What I’m trying to do

The app first shows invoice header data, and below that, it displays different SmartTables for navigation entities such as GLAccountItems, PurchaseOrderItems, etc.

One example SmartTable looks like this:

This works fine — except for one detail:

When I show a field like CostCenter in a SmartField, I get something like this: 1234 (Development General)

But in the SmartTable, I only see: 1234

So the text description (value text) is missing in the table.

 

I’ve learned that this topic is related to Text Associations in SAPUI5 / OData.

 

 

What I found in the metadata

The metadata for the CostCenter field contains a ValueList annotation, which defines its F4 help and seems to refer to a value list entity (VL_SH_FAC_COST_CENTER😞

Picture 1

The referenced value list entity looks like this (simplified for readability):

Picture 2

From what I understand, sap:text="KTEXT" defines the link between the key (KOSTL) and its text. So I assume this is where the “Development General” text comes from when using a SmartField.

 

 

Additional metadata section (possibly related)

There’s also another annotation on the same property that I don’t fully understand:

Picture 3

Does this Common.v1.Text annotation link the CostCenter key to its text value internally? And if yes — why does it work in a SmartField but not inside a SmartTable column?

 

 

What I’ve heard

Apparently, it might be possible to override or extend metadata annotations using a custom annotation file (for example, adding or redefining the com.sap.vocabularies.Common.v1.Text term).

Would this be a valid approach to make the SmartTable also display the text value (e.g., 1234 (Development General)) instead of only the key?

 

 

My question

How can I make my SmartTable display both the key and the text (using the Text Association) for fields like CostCenter — just like SmartField does?

If a custom annotation file is the right way, how exactly should it look like?

If you need additional metadata snippets, project settings, or controller code to help analyze this, I’m happy to share more details.

 

Thanks so much in advance for any help or best practices you can provide!

entry.title: Automatic Sales order exctraction reconize fields
entry.content:
Hi, 

I'm  trying to use FIORI APP Automatic Sales order exctraction.  All the configurations are done and I am able to upload documents.

What is not clear is how the application recognizes data and moves it into the correct field, and how we can permanently solve the wrong interpretation in order to avoid updating order by order.

Some cases : 

1) Part number 

Why product reconized correctly is not moved into "Prodcut " for pos.3, 4, 5..?

2) Qty is 0 ..why ?

In the PDF file is reconized

 

I really appreciate any help.

tks
